snippet: SCHACK--Hon. Arthur M. Beloved husband of Dilia. Loving father of Elaine (Todd) and Douglas (Gina). Proud grandfather of Olivia Grace and Robert Joseph. Dear brother of Burton. Past President of the Brooklyn Counsel of Boy Scouts. History teacher at Bay Ridge High School from 1968 to 1981. Former Counsel for the Major League Baseball Players Association from 1981 to 1998. Current Supreme Court Justice for the State of New York and President of the Nathan R. Sobel Kings County Inn of Court. Services today, 12 noon at Sherman's Flatbush Memorial Chapel, 1283 Coney Island Avenue, Brooklyn. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to either the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society or the Boy Scouts of America. 1/3

Current Supreme Court Justice for the State of New York and President of the Nathan R. Sobel Kings County Inn of Court. Services today, 12 noon at Sherman's Flatbush Memorial Chapel, 1283 Coney Island Avenue, Brooklyn. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to either the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society or the Boy Scouts of America. 1/3
